Trade/Device Name(s): UASure II Blood Uric Acid Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): UASure II Blood Uric Acid Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for UASure II Blood Uric Acid Monitoring System using amperometry for self-monitoring of blood uric acid at home
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing of blood uric acid levels in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip by people with gout to monitor effectiveness of uric acid control at home by prescription, not for diagnosis or medication adjustment without physician consultation
